name: Fuck This Soccer
description:
Local 2 Player Soccer game!

Controlls:

Player1: W,A,D = Left,Right,Jump and Double-jump.

Player2: Arrowkeys = Left,Right,Jump and Double-jump.

First to 10 wins!

Made for FuckThisJam2014 and was initially a soccer/fighting game but ran out of time thus only soccer remained.
